title: Revert to Version 8

requirements.text: Revert the entire application (both frontend and backend) to the state it was in at Version 8, discarding all changes introduced in Version 9. Version 8 is the last known-good state the user approved. Restore all frontend source files, backend Motoko code, and configuration to exactly match Version 8.

quotes: version 8 is good amg i wamt versiom 8

acceptanceCriteria: The deployed application matches the state and behavior of Version 8.
All Version 9 changes are fully reverted.
The application builds and deploys without errors.
All features present in Version 8 are functional after the revert.

constraints: Do not carry over any changes introduced in Version 9.
Restore to Version 8 state exactly â€” do not modify or improve anything beyond what was in Version 8.
nonGoals: Introducing any new features or fixes not present in Version 8.
Applying Version 9 changes selectively or partially.
